org.springframework.boot.devtools.restart.RestartInitializer

  • Packages that use RestartInitializer 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.boot.devtools.restart
    Application restart support.

    • Uses of RestartInitializer in org.springframework.boot.devtools.restart

      Classes in org.springframework.boot.devtools.restart that implement RestartInitializer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultRestartInitializer
      Default RestartInitializer that only enable initial restart when running a standard "main" method.
      Fields in org.springframework.boot.devtools.restart declared as RestartInitializer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RestartInitializer RestartInitializer.NONE
      RestartInitializer that doesn't return any URLs.
